subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova advanced to the final for the second straight year, defeating Jelena Jankovic in a 6-3, 6-1 semifinal that was not as close as the score indicated.
snippet: Maria Sharapova advanced to the final for the second straight year, defeating Jelena Jankovic in a 6-3, 6-1 semifinal that was not as close as the score indicated.
